issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Upon attempting to create a new project in OSX 10.10.1 I receive this error:

Problem Occurred
Creation Problems

Internal error: 

java.lang.NullPointerException

I have uninstalled / reinstalled and ran "sudo npm install titanium -g".
fields.summary: Cannot create a new project in OSX 10.10.1

comments.body: Please explain more about your problem, like steps to reproduce. more error info and a screen shot will be helpful. Thanks

Steps to recreate:
Upgrade OSX to 10.10.1
Install / Upgrade Titanium to latest version
Create new mobile project
-screenshot is just an image of a popup with the following text:
Problem Occurred
Creation Problems

Internal Error:

java.lang.NullPointerException
Please run ”ti setup check“ in terminal, then provide the output to us. Thanks

Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "Create a new project in OSX" in Appcelerator Studio is working fine for me. I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126 and OSX 10.10.3
I recommend you upgrade OSX to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.
I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
